messages.title: Dear Resident,
messages.content: I wanted to say thank you for the warm reception I have received from many of you while out and about in Exeter during this election campaign.

messages.title: Exeter's success
messages.content: I am proud of the success of our city; Exeter has weathered the global financial storm well and we are well placed to thrive in the recovery now underway.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The choice in Exeter on 6th May is between Labour and the Conservatives. It's neck and neck so your vote will count.

issues.economy: Exeter has weathered the global financial storm well and we are well placed to thrive in the recovery now underway.

leaflet.personalStatement: It is a great honour to work for you and Exeter, meeting people and trying to help with their problems.

images.caption: Ben Bradshaw, Labour Candidate for Exeter.

leaflet.additionalNotes: P.S. If you need a lift to the polling station, please call 275004.
